articles.description: The Tigers have lost four Championship games in a row and Saturday's heavy defeat took their goals against tally to 21 from just 10 games
articles.content: Call it a vote of confidence, call it a stay of execution, call it whatever you want. Shota Arveladze is a man under growing pressure at Hull City and the manner of Saturday's 3-0 defeat Swansea City… [+3760 chars]
